data.title: Magadan weather forecast, climate chart: temperature, humidity (average
data.meta_description: Magadan current conditions, weather forecast and climate chart (temperature and humidity). Magadan free weather widget (free script for your website or blog). Magadan weather conditions, average/minimum/maximum temperature, humidity variation graphs. Magadan local time, GMT offset and weather information.

Weather Station: Magadan (latitude 59-33N, longitude 150-47E)

Local Time:

Magadan is in the "Asia/Magadan" timezone.

The "Asia/Magadan" timezone uses a Standard Time (ST) / Daylight Saving Time (DST) alternation scheme, and it currently is in ST (since Sunday, 24 April 2016, 03:00 AM local time). During ST, the offset to Universal Time (UTC, GMT or Zulu) is +11:00 hours.

Magadan will exit standard time (entering DST) on Tuesday, 19 January 2038, at 14:14 local time, when clocks will be turned forward 0 hour to Tuesday, 19 January 2038, 14:14 local daylight time. During DST, the offset to UTC will be +11:00 hours.
